location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of twenty chests of sabres and a fire engine, which was shipped from Bombay on board the Country Ship Moholar. It notes the Resident is awaiting the instructions of Sir Gore Ouseley concerning what to do with them.
